summary: ON APRIL 2 2010 THE COMPANY THAT MY HUSBAND WORKS FOR GARDA CASH LOGOSTIC'S THERE TRUCKS SEEM TO BE IN VERY BAD SHAPE. THERE ARE CONTINUAL BREAK DOWNS OF THE TRUCKS THAT LEAVE THE MEN IN DANGER FOR ROBBERY AND THE FEDERAL MONEY TO BE STOLEN....THIS NEEDS TO BE CHECKED INTO BEFORE SOMETHING HAPPENS., I HAVE ALSO REPORTED THIS TO OSHA TO SEE WHAT TYPE OF INVESTIGATION FOLLOW UP THEY CAN ALSO DO. THEY DID REFER TO TO THE DOT TO SEE WHAT TYPE OF INVESTIGATION YOU CAN FOLLOW UP ON THIS MATTER.

I WAS SOLD A DEFECTIVE MOBILE HOME. I AM LIVING IN AN ILLEGAL HOME, A HOME THAT WAS PROHIBITED FROM SALE, YET I WAS NOT TOLD THIS. THIS HOME IS FILLED WITH IMMINENT SAFETY HAZARDS DEFECTS AND SERIOUS DEFECTS. THIS HOME IS DANGEROUS. I HAVE PLENTY OF PROOF TO BACK UP MY COMPLAINT. *TR

CAR HAS BEEN TAKEN INTO DEALERSHIP 3 OR MORE TIMES FOR SAME PROBLEM (RADIATOR LEAKING AND CAR OVERHEATING), KEEP TELLING US IT IS FIXED, WE PAY A COUPLE THOUSAND DOLLARS, PROBLEM STARTS AGAIN IN A WEEK. HAVE REPLACED SEVERAL PARTS. THEY TAKE NO RESPONSIBILITY TO FIX IT ONCE AND FOR ALL W/OUT CHARGING US AGAIN.  *TR
TREAD/BELT SEPARATION ON REAR TRAILER TIRES. *JB

THE AIRBAG CLOCK SPRING NEEDS REPLACED. THE AIR BAG LIGHT HAS COME ON THAT AFFECTS HORN AND CRUISE CONTROL. CHRYSLER HAD A RECALL FOR THIS SITUATION. THE REPAIR SHOULD NOT HAVE TO COME FROM CONSUMER AS CONSUMER HAS NO CONTROL OVER THIS MECHANISM. THE AIR BAG HAS NEVER BEEN RELEASED ON THIS VEHICLE BUT NOW MAY FAIL IN AN ACCIDENT. PROBLEM WILL NOT FIX ITSELF. CHEVY TRACKER YEAR 2000.  *TR

THE 2000 BMW 323I HAD  A DESIGN FLAW IN THE TRANSMISSION. THE MOST WIDESPREAD SYMPTOM OF THIS PROBLEM APPEARED  TO BE THE FAILURE OF THE REVERSE GEAR. THIS HAPPENED  WITHOUT ANY WARNING . NO OTHER MECHANICAL PROBLEMS OR ELECTRONIC WARNING LIGHTS WERE EVIDENT.  THERE  WAS A LARGE NUMBER OF PEOPLE WHO ENCOUNTERED THE SAME  PROBLEM. SEE THIS WEBSITE FOR A COMPILATION OF COMPLAINTS.  HTTP://WWW.CONSUMERAFFAIRS.COM/AUTOMOTIVE/BMW_TRANS.HTML  BMW REFUSED TO ACKNOWLEDGE THIS AS A DESIGN FLAW. SINCE THE REPAIR FOR THIS WAS VERY EXPENSIVE $4500  THERE  WAS WIDESPREAD HARDSHIP CAUSED TO BMW CUSTOMERS.*AK

JUST FUELED UP SUBURBAN AND GOT ON HIGHWAY TO GO OUT OF TOWN WHEN SUBURBAN STARTED JERKING. I TRIED TURNING THE AIR CONDITIONER OFF AND THE CAR STARTED DECELERATING AND LOST POWER IN MIDDLE OF THE HIGHWAY. I COULD NOT RESTART CAR ALTHOUGH IT WOULD TURN OVER IT HAD NO POWER AND WOULD DIE IMMEDIATLEY. HAD TO HAVE VEHICLE TOWED IN WHICH COST ME $63.00 TO FIRESTONE AND THEN THEY HAD TO RUN A DIAGNOSTIC TEST TO SEE WHAT THE PROBLEM WAS AND THEY STATED THE FUEL PUMP WAS DEFECTIVE AND THAT THE FUEL FILTER SHOULD BE CHANGED ALSO. THIS TOTAL COMES TO 965.00 AND I FEEL THAT SINCE THIS IS A RECALL ITEM THAT YOU SHOULD REIMBURSE ME FOR THIS EVENT I HAVE GONE THROUGH.

DT*: THE CONTACT STATED THE BUS HAD AN ELECTRICAL PROBLEM AND THE COMPUTER BOARD WAS DEFECTIVE.  THE COMPUTER SYSTEM ALLOWED THE COMPRESSOR TO SHORT OUT AND ALLOWED THE COMPRESSOR AND FAN TO WORK SEPARATELY, BUT NOT SIMULTANEOUSLY.  THE SERVICE DEALER COULD NOT DUPLICATED THE PROBLEM.  ALSO THE ANTIFREEZE TANK FLOW THROUGH SYSTEM ALLOWED ANTIFREEZE TO FLOW THROUGH THE ELECTRICAL SYSTEM CAUSING SHORT CIRCUITING.

CAR DIED WHILE DRIVING.  NO ENGINE LIGHT INDICATING PROBLEMS.  INSTALLED TIMING BELT BUT WITH NO RESULTS.  HAD BOTH LOWER HEADS REPLACED BUT ONE WAS DEFECTIVE FROM MANUFACTURER.  PARTS COVERED UNDER WARRANTY.  I PAID $572.00 FOR DEDUCTIBLE, LABOR NOT COVERED AND TAXES.  ALL ELSE PAID BY WARRANTY COMPANY.  WAS WITHOUT MY CAR FROM SEPT. 8- SEPT. 29TH.  RETURNED CAR ON OCT. 19TH TO REPLACE DEFECTIVE HEAD.  WORK COMPLETED ON OCT. 25TH.  RETURNED CAR ON NOV. 10TH FOR ENGINE LIGHT CHECK.  HAD COIL PACK REPLACED ON 1, 3, 5 . $127.19 FOR PART AND $170.00 FOR LABOR.  NO RENTAL CAR DURING REPAIR TIME.  *NM

I HAVE A 2000 GRAND AM GT WITH LESS THEN 45,000 MILES. BOUGHT THE CAR NEW. I HAVE HAD PROBLEMS WITH THE AC UNIT SINCE DAY 1.  WHEN I GOT THE CAR THE AC DID NOT WORK, BROUGHT IT TO THE DEALER WHICH WAS FIXED UNDER WARRANTY.  IN 2003 OR 2004 THE AC UNIT WENT OUT AGAIN. HAD THE UNIT FIXED AGAIN, COST ME AROUND $600/700 TO REPAIR.   CAR AT THAT TIME WAS NOT UNDER WARRANTY.  HERE IT IS 2005 & THE AC UNIT IS NOT WORKING AGAIN. CAN'T UNDERSTAND WHAT THE PROBLEM IS WITH THIS UNIT & HOW MANY TIMES AM I GOING TO HAVE TO HAVE THIS UNIT FIXED AT MY EXPENSE. I LIVE IN AN AREA WHERE  WE ONLY USE THE AIR 3 MONTHS OUT OF THE YEAR, AT MOST.  THIS IS A VERY EXPENSIVE PROBLEM FOR ME.  ALSO,  JUST RECENTLY MY LOW COOLANT LIGHT WENT ON.  I NOTICED BY READING OTHER COMPLAINTS THAT THIS IS A RE-OCCURRING PROBLEM FOR MANY GRAND AM OWNERS. WHY AREN'T THE CAR COMPANIES DOING SOMETHING ABOUT THESE PROBLEMS. THESE ARE NOT OLD CARS.  IT SEEMS THEY ALL HAVE  LOW MILEAGE,WITH SERIOUS AND EXPENSIVE  PROBLEMS. *JB
PROBLEMS WITH SEAT BELT, ENGINE, TAPE DECK AND MIRRORS.  *NM  *SB  *NM

MY COMPLIANT DEALS WITH THE REAR SUB FRAME DESIGN OF THE BMW E46 BODYSTYLES, KNOWINGLY PRESENT IN 1999 TO 2003 3 SERIES MODELS. I HAVE A 2000 328I. *AK    THE REAR SUB FRAME ISSUE IS A WELL DOCUMENTED ISSUE ON MESSAGE BOARDS INCLUDING E46FANATICS.COM AND BIMMER.ORG AND HAS BEEN UPSETTING MANY E46 OWNERS. THIS IS A MAJOR SAFETY HAZARD AND VERY COSTLY TO FIX.    A FEW THINGS TO CONSIDER.  - BMW OF GERMANY HAS OFFERED A FREE REAR SUBFRAME INSPECTION. USA HAS NOT.  - TURNER MOTORSPORTS HAS BROUGHT TO MARKET A 'REAR SUBFRAME RE-INFORCEMENT KIT' (WHY SHOULD SOMEONE HAVE TO RE-INFORCE A FRAME OF A CAR)  - BMW HAS AGREED TO FIX THIS ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS, USUALLY ONCE SOMEONE STARTS THREATING A LAWSUIT.  - HARLOFF BMW IN ENCINITAS, CA MISSED SEEING THIS 1 WEEK PRIOR TO ME BRINGING IT IN. THEY DID A SAFETY INSPECTION AND SENT ME ON MY WAY.    BMW HAS RECENTLY DENIED MY CLAIM TO FIX THIS. WITHOUT PROVIDING ME A REASON. FINALLY I RECEIVED A REASON TODAY. "SINCE YOU ARE NOT THE ORIGINAL OWNER WE CANNOT GUARANTEE THE SERVICE RECORDS". FIRST OF ALL, I AM THE ORIGINAL OWNER AND AM COMPLETELY SHOCKED AT THIS STATEMENT BECAUSE I'VE ONLY TAKEN MY CAR TO THIS DEALER FOR SERVICING IN THE LAST 5 YEARS (HARLOFF BMW). SECONDLY, THERE ARE A FEW NAMES I CAN GIVE YOU OF PEOPLE WHO HAVE GOTTEN THIS FIXED BEING SECOND GENERATION OWNERS.    BMW HAS BEEN COMPLETELY ABSURD IN DEALING WITH THESE ISSUES. IT'S NOT JUST ME. ASK ANYONE WHO HAS HAD TO DEAL WITH IT, AND THEY WILL TELL YOU THE SAME. THERE WAS MAJOR ISSUES WITH THE REAR SUB FRAME ON THE E36 (DESIGN BEFORE E46) AND IT JUST SEEMS BMW DIDN'T WORK ALL THE KINKS OUT. I'M NOT OUT TO HARM BMW OR ANYONE, I JUST WANT MY CAR FIXED. I THINK IT IS LUDACRIS THERE IS A 3RD PARTY VENDOR SELLING A RE-INFORCEMENT KIT FOR A CAR I SPENT CLOSE TO 50K DOLLARS ON. I APPRECIATE ANY ASSISTANCE YOU GIVE.

MODEL V12 ON CONSUMER'S 2000 BEAVER MOTORHOME WAS NOT PART OF THE RECALL ISSUED FOR HURRICANE DIESEL FURNACES.  *LA   (THE COPPER HEAT EXCHANGER EXIT TUBE FAILED DUE TO THE DESIGN FLAW THAT INCORPORATED MATERIALS THAT WERE SUBSTANTIALLY DIFFERENT COEFFICIENT OF THERMAL EXPANSION IN TIGHT SLIP TUBE JOINT PER ANALYSIS)  THERE WERE REPEATED BURNING OUT OF THE IGNITERS.  THE DIESEL OIL PUMP WAS REPLACED.  WHILE TRAVELING, 3 IGNITERS BURNED OUT.  THE EXHAUST TUBE WAS COMPLETELY BURNED OUT  FROM THE BOTTOM OF THE FURNACE.  IT WAS FOUND THAT THIS WAS A PROBLEM DUE TO A BAD DESIGN.  (ALTERNATE ADDRESS FOR THE CONSUMER IS:  PO BOX 27, OCEAN SHORES, WA., 98569 NO./360-289-0809)  BEAVER MOTORHOME 2000   *SC *JB

UPON PURCHASING A 2000 CASITA TRAVEL TRAILER IN CONNETICUT, WHILE IN ROUTE TO PENNSYLVANIA THE LEFT TIRE CAME APART AND BLEW OUT, AND INSTALLED NEW SPARE AND AFTER REACHING HOME HAD 3 NEW TIRES AND WHEELS INSTALLED.THE TIRES THAT WERE REMOVED WERE PLACED IN STORAGE IN THE GARAGE AND JUST FROM SITTING UPON EXAMINATION OF THE RIGHT TIRE THAT WAS REMOVED THE BELTS WERE SHIFTED AND THE TREAD WAS ABOUT TO SEPARATE.  THIS TIRE WOULD NOT HAVE MADE FOR ANOTHER 25 MILES WITHOUT INCIDENT.  CARLISLE SIZE 175X80XR13.  THE TIRE THAT BLEW OUT WAS SEVERELY DESTROYED THERE WAS NO D.O.T. NUMBER LEFT TO READ, THE TIRE THAT WAS COMING APART AS I WRITE THIS HAS THE NUMBER (11 12 08 DOT DBJU H12 319), THE SPARE TIRE HAS ALL THE SAME NUMBERS EXCEPT THE LAST 3 DIGITS ARE 229.  *LA

THIS IS RE A TRAVEL TRAILER TIRE PROBLEM.  OUR 2000 HILO TOWLITE HAS ST175-80X13 LOAD RANGE B GOODYEAR MARATHON TIRES.  THE MANUFACTURER STICKER WITH GVWR ETC STATES TIRE PRESSURE AT 50 PSI.  LOAD RANGE B TIRES ARE DESIGNED FOR 35 PSI.  SOME MONTHS AGO I SENT THE MANUFACTURER AN EMAIL ADVISING THEM OF THIS.  THEY SAID 50 PSI WAS SAFE.  I REQUESTED CONFIRMATION FROM GOODYEAR, WHICH RESPONDED THAT 35 PSI WAS THE MAXIMUM.  I ADVISED THE MANUFACTURER, WHO ASKED IF I WANTED A NEW STICKER.  I ASKED IF THEY SHOULDN'T RESEARCH TO SEE HOW MANY TRAILERS HAD THE WRONG INFO, SINCE THIS COULD BE A SAFETY ISSUE.  THEY BECAME INDIGNANT AND REFUSED TO DISCUSS IT FURTHER BY EMAIL.  THAT CONCERNS ME, BECAUSE SUCH OVERINFLATION COULD WELL CAUSE A BLOWOUT, ENDANGERING LIVES.  MY VIN IS [XXX].*AK    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR

THIS TRAILER GATE HAD NO SAFETY DEVICES ON IT TO HOLD IT IN THE UP POSITION RESULTING IN THE DEATH OF OUR FIVE YEAR OLD DAUGHTER.*JB
2ND TIRE OF 2 TIRE BLOWOUT AT SAME TIME.  TREAD SEPARATED FROM CASING ON BOTH TIRES.*AK
3 TIRES BLEW OUT -TREAD SEPARATED.*AK

THE HITCH ON THIS TRAILER WAS IMPROPERLY  INSTALLED RESULTING IN THE HITCH TEARING AWAY FROM THE FRAME AND THE TRAILER DROPPING ON TOP OF THE BED OF OUR TRUCK. THREE SIDES WERE RIPPED TO WITHIN THREE INCHES OF TEARING AWAY COMPLETELY AND ONE SIDE WAS ALL THE WAY SHORN OFF. THIS HITCH WAS WELDED ONTO THE FRAME BUT FOUR INCHES OF DEAD AIR SPACE WAS LEFT BETWEEN THE FIRST STEEL FRAME BAR AND THE BAR THE HITCH WAS WELDED ONTO. THIS RESULTED IN A SWAY BETWEEN THE TWO THAT CAUSED THE HITCH TO TEAR AWAY FROM THE FRAME. IF NOT NOTICED THE FRAME WOULD HAVE TORN AWAY FROM THE HITCH AND LEFT THE TRAILER WITH NO GUIDANCE CAUSING A MAJOR TRAFFIC SAFTETY HAZZARD AND POTENTIAL ACCIDENT. WE HAD TO HAVE THE ENTIRE FRONT END OF THE TRAILER REBUILT TO HOLD THE SUBSTANCIAL WEIGHT OF PULLING THIS VEHICLE. THIS TRAILER IS SUPPOSED TO BE ABLE TO HOLD A CAR INSIDE. IF WE HAD EVER PUT A CAR OR ANYTHING OF THAT WEIGHT IN IT THE HITCH WOULD HAVE TORN OFF COMPLETELY. THIS DAMAGE WAS DONE BY JUST PULLING THE WEIGHT OF THE TRAILER. WHEN THE  TRAILER DROPPED DOWN THE ELECTRICAL BOX WAS SHEARED OFF AND THE BRAKE WIRES TO THE TRAILER WERE SEVERED WHILE TRAVELING DOWN A STEEP GRADE OUTSIDE OF FLAGSTAFF, AZ. THE TRUCK PULLING HAD TO ENGINE BRAKE TO HOLD BACK THE TRAILER FROM PUSHING THE TRUCK DOWN THE HILL. (A DROP OF 5000' IN @ 20 MILES.) THE MANUFACTURER HAS NOT AKNOWLEDGED THAT THIS IS A STRUCTURAL DEFECT AND WOULD NOT COVER THE COST OF THE REPAIRS.*AK

THE "A" FRAME TONGUE ON THE TRAVEL TRAILER IS BENDING UPWARD. I HAD CONCERNS WHEN I BOUGHT THE TRAILER THAT IT WAS TOO LARGE AND HEAVY FOR THE LIGHT WEIGHT FRAME USED. I AM CONVINCED THAT THE SIZE AND DESIGN OF THIS TRAILER IS CAUSING THE FRAME TO BEND. MY CONCERN IS THAT IF I LEAVE THIS ALONE WITHOUT CORRECTING IT SOMETHING WILL BREAK AND CAUSE THE TRAILER TO BREAK LOOSE AND CAUSE A SERIOUS ACCIDENT.*AK

THE FRONT AND REAR SUSPENSION FAULTY WELDS. *AK

ON 2000 AND NEWER AMTRAN RE SCHOOL BUSES EQUIPPED WITH REMOTE POWER MIRRORS THERE IS A REFLECTION IN THE WINDSHIELD THAT PREVENTS THE DRIVER FROM SEEING THE RIGHT HAND REAR VIEW MIRROR WHEN THE SUN HITS THE WINDSHIELD AT THE RIGHT ANGLE. I DRIVE ONE OF THESE BUSES ON A DAILY BASIS AND HAVE FOUND THAT WHEN THIS HAPPENS YOU NOT ONLY CANNOT SEE THE MIRROR, BUT YOU CANNOT SEE THE VEHICLE IN THE LANE ON YOUR RIGHT HAND SIDE EITHER. THIS COULD BE THE CAUSE OF A SIDE IMPACT TYPE ACCIDENT INVOLVING ANOTHER VEHICLE OR A PEDESTRIAN. I CORRECTED THE PROBLEM ON THE VEHICLE THAT I OPERATE BY PAINTING THE RIGHT HAND WINDSHIELD POST FLAT BLACK. THIS ELIMINATES THE REFLECTION TOTALLY. I HAVE NOTIFIED PEOPLE AT MY PLACE OF EMPLOY AND TOLD THEM THAT I WOULD BE WILLING TO FIX THE PROBLEM IN THE OTHER BUSES ON THE LOT. I HAVE BEEN ALLOWED TO FIX 9 VEHICLES. THEY WILL NOT LET ME FIX ANY OTHERS. THIS IS WHY YOU ARE BEING NOTIFIED. PLEASE LOOK INTO THIS SITUATION. THE SCHOOL BUS INDUSTRY HAS PEOPLE BLAMING US FOR ALL SORTS OF THINGS THAT HAPPEN WHILE WE DRIVE DOWN THE ROAD. RUNNING ANOTHER VEHICLE OFF THE ROAD BECAUSE A DRIVER CANNOT SEE IT ON HIS RIGHT AFTER SUPERVISORS AND NATIONAL ORGANIZATIONS HAD BEEN NOTIFIED OF THE PROBLEM WOULD CERTAINLY NOT DO THE INDUSTRY ANY GOOD. I HAVE DRIVEN ALL TYPES OF COMMERCIAL VEHICLES FOR OVER 1.5 MILLION MILES WITHOUT AN ACCIDENT. I DO NOT WISH TO START NOW. PLEASE HELP NOTIFY THE RIGHT PEOPLE TO GET THIS CORRECTED. CONTACT MY ON MY CELL AT 414-520-5110 SO WE CAN GET TOGETHER AND TALK ABOUT THIS AT GREATER LENGTH*AK
CASING SPLIT CROSSWISE TO THE TREAD ON ONE, ABNORMAL INSIDE WEAR ON OTHER TIRE.*AK (DOT NUMBER: DBJUH12200  TIRESIZE: ST17580R13)
THIS IS THE THIRD FAILURE OF THIS SYSTEM 1 AND 2 FAILURE  HAPPENED ON INTERSTATE. *AK

OUR TRAILER, POSSESSIONS, AND OUR PETS COULD EASILY HAVE BEEN REDUCED TO ASHES ON THE ROADSIDE IF WE HAD NOT EXTINGUISHED THE FIRE QUICKLY. WHEN THE 2 FRONT WINDOWS ARE UP AND THE 2 REAR WINDOWS ARE DOWN FULLY/SLIGHTY, THERE IS A TERRIBLE AIR POCKET CREATED INSIDE THE VEHICLE CAUSING MY EARDRUMS TO POP AND NEARLY BURST. A REVERB OF RUSHING AIR MAKES IT EXTREMELY NOISY AND HURTS THE EARS UNTIL I LET THE FRONT WINDOWS DOWN PARTIALLY TO RELIEVE SOME OF THE INSIDE PRESSURE.THIS OCCURS DRIVING AROUND 40MPH AND GETS WORST AS SPEEDS INCREASE. IT IS EXTREMELY DANGEROUS TO THE EARS AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS WHEN ONLY THE BOTH REAR WINDOWS ARE PULLED DOWN. MY EARSDRUM FEELS LIKE ERUPTING AT THIS POINT, UNTIL I LET DOWN THE FRONT WINDOWS SOME.*AK
SEAT BELTS RELEASED ON PASSENGER AND REAR MIDDLE UPON IMPACT.*AK

WHILE DRIVING SMOKE BEGAN TO ACCUMULATE IN THE CAR.  CAR DIED.  PULLED OVER AND LOOKED UNDER HOOD.  COULD SEE NO PROBLEM.  INTERIOR OF CAR CONTINUED TO SMOKE.  BROKE BATTERY CABLE.  BEGAN TO WALK AWAY, LOOKED BACK, SAW FLAMES ON PASSENGER FRONT SEAT.  FIRE DEPARTMENT CALLED.  WIRES UNDER SEAT SHORTED OUT AND BURNED THE SEAT, DOOR AND CARPET.*AK

WIFE WAS TRAVELING AT ESTIMATED SPEED OF 35 MPH. CAR LEFT THE ROAD, HIT A TREE. HER LEGS WERE TRAPPED.  PRELIMINARY AUTOPSY RESULTS FOUND A RUPTURED LIVER AND A BROKEN BACK. WITHIN APPROX. 3 MINUTES OF CRASH, CAR WAS TOTALLY ENGULFED IN FLAMES. UNABLE TO DETERMINE IF AIR BAGS DEPLOYED. THIS IS DUE TO THE INTENSITY OF THE FIRE.TO DATE, LEGAL AUTHORITIES HAVE NOT DETERMINED CAUSE OF ACCIDENT. FIR APPEARS TO HAVE STARTED AT TOP AREA OF ENGINE.*AK
THE LEFT BRAKE SEEMED TO GRAB AND SKID THE TIRE.  THEN THE WHEEL BROKE OFF FROM THE WHEEL DRUM.  THE LUGS WERE CUT IN HALF.  ONE LUG NUT IS CROSS THREADED.

OUR RANGE SELECTOR (GOING FROM LOW TO HIGH AND THEN HIGH TO LOW) BECAME VERY SLUGGIST.  THIS WAS IN APRIL OF 2001.  WE TOOK THE TRUCK INTO SLC, UT FREIGHTLINER AND THEY GREASED THE BOX.  LEFT AND IT WAS STILL NOT FIXED.  THE SHORT OF IT IS, IS THAT WE HAVE HAD IT IN 6 TIMES FOR THE SAME REPAIR AND THEY CANNOT FIGURE OUT WHAT THE PROBLEM IS.  THREE TIMES THEY REPLACED THE SAME PART.  THE MANUFACTURER IS STUMPED.  IN THE MEANTIME, WE ARE LOSING TEAM MONEY WHILE THE LAST PLACE (NOW) HAS HAD IT FOR 2 WEEKS.  IT FINALLY GOT SO BAD WE HAD TO DEADHEAD ABOUT 1000 MILES HOME BECAUSE WE DIDN'T WANT TO PULL ANY WEIGHT WHILE FIGHTING WITH THE TRANSMISSION.  EVERYONE SEEMS STUMPED AND WE ARE THE ONES LOSING THE PAYCHECK.

THE DIAMETER OF THE PIN AND THE DIAMETER OF THE HOLE CAUSES A FORWARD AND AFTERWARD MOVEMENT OF APPROXIMATELY 70/1000'S OF AN INCH. THIS CAUSED AN EXCESSIVE "KLUNK" WHEN STARTING OR STOPPING WITH A FITH WHEEL HOOKED UP.  I FEEL THIS COULD CAUSE THE PINS TO SHEAR WHEN BRAKES ARE APPLIED IN AN EMERGENCY STOP.  *AK

summary: UPON START CAN'T SHIFT OUT OF PARK WITHOUT USING SHIFTLOCK RELEASE-SOMETIMES PUMPING BRAKE PEDAL REPEATEDLY UNLOCKS LEVER AND A LOUD CLUNKING SOUND OCCURS.  BRAKES GET SOFT INTERMITTENTLY AND PEDAL GOES TO FLOORBOARD, HAVE TO PUMP BRAKES TO REGAIN PRESSURE.  CRUISE CONTROL NO LONGER WORKS. ELECTRIC DRIVER POWER MIRROR OPERATES SPORADICALLY.*AK
EXCESSIVE BRIGHTNESS TO ONCOMING DRIVER.  ( NEW HIGH INTENSITY BULBS). *AK

THIS CARLISLE TRAILER TIRE WAS ON OUR 27 FOOT CEDAR CREEK TRAVEL TRAILER.   WE ALWAYS AIR OUR TRAILER TIRES TO 50 LBS BEFORE LEAVING ON A ROAD TRIP AND HAD DONE SO ON THIS MORNING; WE WERE 15 MINUTES FROM HOME AND WERE TRAVELING THROUGH A RESIDENTIAL NEIGHBORHOOD AT 30-35 MPH WHEN THE SEVERE BLOWOUT OCCURRED.  THE TIRE WAS COMPLETELY DESTROYED (ALMOST DISINTEGRATED) AND IT TORE UP OUR SEWER SYSTEM WHICH WAS NEXT TO THE TIRE, AND DAMAGED THE FENDER OVER THE TIRE.  THIS TIRE WAS NOT ABUSED AT ANY TIME BY US. TO THE CONTRARY, WE ALWAYS PAY CLOSE ATTENTION TO MAINTENANCE ON OUR TIRES AND ARE VERY CAREFUL TO TAKE PROPER CARE OF THEM.   WE HAVE TALKED TO ANOTHER LOCAL TRAVEL TRAILER OWNER WHO ALSO HAD CARLISLE TIRES AND HE HAS HAD THREE BLOWOUTS OF THIS SAME TIRE.   WE STILL HAVE FOUR OF THESE TIRES ON OUR TRAILER AND ARE TERRIFIED TO GET ON THE ROAD BECAUSE WE FEEL CERTAIN THAT THESE TIRES ARE DEFECTIVE.  WE HAVE REPORTED THE PROBLEM AND ASKED FOR SOME ASSURANCE FROM THE CARLISLE COMPANY THAT THESE ARE SAFE TIRES.  THEY REFERRED US TO THE DUNLOP MANUFACTURING COMPANY.          WE TOOK THE BLOWN TIRE TO THE LOCAL CARLISLE TIRE DEALER AND HE TOOK THE TIRE TO SEND TO HIS DISTRIBUTOR AND IT WAS TO HAVE BEEN SENT TO CARLISLE FOR INSPECTION AND DETERMINATION OF SAFETY.    HOWEVER,   AFTER CONTINUOUS CALLS FOR FOUR WEEKS, I WAS TOLD THAT THE TIRE HAS BEEN DESTROYED AND NO DETERMINATION WILL BE MADE.      HOWEVER, WE FEEL THAT SOME DETERMINATION SHOULD BE MADE ABOUT THE SAFETY OF THE OTHER CARLISLE TIRES THAT WE HAVE ON OUR TRAILER---AND THAT OTHER CONSUMERS HAVE ON THEIR TRAILERS.    CAN YOU HELP US???    JOE A. AND CAROL C. JARRED.  *AK (DOT NUMBER: CR957-2  TIRESIZE: ST205-75-1)

components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE,INTERIOR LIGHTING,EQUIPMENT,UNKNOWN OR OTHER
summary: THE DAY I BOUGHT THE CAR THE AIR CONDITIONER WENT OUT AND HAS AND STILL IS GOING OUT. WHEN THE SERVICE DEPARTMENT FIXES THE PROBLEM IT STILL DOESN'T BLOW COLD AIR. IT TAKES ABOUT 30MIN-1HR. TO COOL DOWN.  THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT HAS CAME ON TWICE AND HAD TO BE TOWED THE SECOND TIME AND WAS IN THE SHOP FOR TWO WEEKS. WHEN I BOUGHT THE CAR THE DEALER TOLD ME I WOULD RECIEVE ABOUT 34 MILES PER GALLON AND I HAVE RECEIVED VERY POOR GAS MILEAGE, LAST TIME I CHECKED I WENT 170 ON ONE TANK OF GAS.  WHEN THE CAR WAS PARKED I NOTICED WHEN I SAT IN THE BACK SEAT THE DOME LIGHT FLICKERS.  THE CAR HAS CONTINUALLY BEEN IN THE SHOP SINCE I PURCHASED THE VEHICLE AND I'VE ONLY HAD IT ABOUT 2 WEEKS OUT OF THE WHOLE 1 1/2 MONTHS I HAVE OWNED THE CAR. APPARENTLY THE PROBLEMS ARE NOT FIXABLE. I HAVE CONTACTED DAEWOO EVERYTIME AND THEY HAVE BEEN RUDE AND DISCOURTEOUS EVERYTIME AND I JUST WANT SOMETHING DONE. I HAVE WENT THREW 4 RENT CARS AND I BOUGHT THIS CAR BRAND NEW WITH 178 MILES ON IT.  *AK
EXHAUST HAS NO HEAT SHIELD ON EXHAUST THAT PASSES BY RIGHT SIDE FENDER, CAUSING  FENDER TO GET HOT AND CATCH ON FIRE BY MY SONS RIGHT LEG.*AK

FUEL INJECTION IS STILL NOT CORRECT AT LOW RPM WHICH CAUSES  MOTORCYCLE TO LOSE POWER WHILE ROLLING ON TO THROTTLE, BIKE SOMETIMES BECOMES UNSTABLE WHILE TAKING SLOW TURNS BECAUSE THE BIKE WILL LOSE POWER THEN JUMP
THERE IS A FUEL INJECTION GLITCH IN ALL 2000 TT600'S. THE BIKE WILL DIE WHILE GOING DOWN THE ROAD OR IN CORNERS.*AK( DOT NUMBER:  )

THERE IS A FUEL INJECTION GLITCH ON THIS MOTORCYCLE THAT COULD BE POTENTIALLY DANGEROUS, THE FACTORY WON'T ACKOWLEDGE IT, BUT THEY HAVE REVISED 2001 MOTORCYCLES WITH NEW CAMSHAFTS AND HEADER PIPES TO ADDRESS THE ISSUE(THOUGH THEY DENY IT PUBLICLY). THE PROBLEM IS THAT THE BIKE HESITATES MASSIVELY AT  BETWEEN 4000-5000 RPM'S AND THE ISSUE CAN NOT SEEM TO BE RESOLVED BY DEALERS. YOU CAN SEE THAT ALL 2000 TT600 OWNERS SUFFER FROM THIS ISSUE BY CONTACTING THEM OR GOING TO THIS WEBSITE AND LOOKING AT ALL OF THE COMPLAINTS: HTTP://WWW.TRIUMPHNET.COM/TT/
THE FUEL CUT-OFF SWITCH DID NOT PERFORM ITS FUNCTION.  *AK

BRAKES WENT TO THE FLOOR WHEN DEPLOYED.  HAVE RECEIVED INFORMATION FROM OTHER OWNERS OF ALPINE COACH THAT BRAKE FAILURES ARE OCCURRING.  WRV CLAIMS REPORTS OF CALIPER PISTON DRAG ARE BEING INVESTIGATED, BUT OWNERS ARE NOT BEING NOTIFIED OR CAUTIONED.  SINCE THE GVW OF THE MOTORHOME IS 26,000 LBS, SERIOUS INJURY OR DEATH COULD OCCUR IF THE BRAKE FAILURE CAUSES AN ACCIDENT.  THERE IS NO PRIOR WARNING OF BRAKE FAILURE EXCEPT THE ABS LIGHT COMES ON.  UNFORTUNATELY, THE ABS LIGHT ON THESE COACHES IS MALFUNCTIONAL AND COMES ON AND STAYS ON, AT TIMES FOR DAYS.  THEREFORE IT CANNOT BE CONSIDERED AN INDICATION OF BRAKE FAILURE.  WRV IS REPLACING THE ABS MODULE ON THE COACHES IF THE OWNER COMPLAINS AND TAKES THE COACH TO THE YAKIMA, WASHINGTON FACTORY.  IT WAS AFTER REPLACEMENT OF THE ABS MODULE THAT OUR BRAKES FAILED.  APPARENTLY THESE ARE THE CIRCUMSTANCES THAT HAVE OCCURRED WITH OTHER ALPINE COACH OWNERS.*AK

EXCELSIOR-HENDERSON MOTORCYCLE CO. (EH) IS BANKRUPT AND OUT OF BUSINESS.  AT LEAST SIX TRANSMISSIONS HAVE "LOCKED UP" CAUSING THE REAR WHEEL TO FREEZE CAUSING A POTENTIALLY DEADLY PROBLEM.  THERE ARE SEVERAL HUNDRED EH BIKES ON THE ROAD AND THE RIDERS WOULD LIKE TO PRESS THE TRANSMISSION BUILDER, INASAKA GEAR, TO OFFER A FIX.   THE FAILURES ARE BEING DISCOVERED/DISCUSSED ON A WEB SITE FOR EH RIDERS.  THANK YOU.*AK
HEADLIGHT WENT OUT WHILE DRIVING AT NIGHT  SCARED THE HELL OUT OF ME . I DONT WANN DIE IN A DAWOO .VERY DANGEROUS PROBLEM.  *AK

WHEN TITAN MOTORCYCLES WERE SOLD, THE MOTORCYCLES WERE SOLD WITH A WARRANTY OF 4 YEARS. TITAN HAS RECENNTLY FILED CHAPTER 7 BANKRUPCY. I AM NOT ABLE TO CONTACT TITAN TO ASK ABOUT THE WARRANTY. TITAN WAS GOING TO WARRANTY THE MOTORCYCLES FOR 6 MONTHS THEMSELVES AND THEN PURCHASE A WARRANTY WITH AN INSURANCE COMPANY FOR THE REMAINING 3.5 YEARS. THE LCAL DEALER IN GREENSBORO NC (336-292-4262) TELLS ME THAT THEY HAVE CUSTOMERS WHO PURCHASED  MOTORCYCLES BACK AS FAR AS JAN. 2000 WHO DID NOT EVER GET TRANSFERRED TO THE INSURANCE COMPANY AND NOW HAVE NO WARRANTY. I WANT TO FIND OUT IF TITAN OR THE COURTS MUST MAKE THE WARRANTY GOOD? THIS IS POTENTIALLY THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE THAT DID NOT RECEIVE WHAT THEY PAID FOR AND WERE PROMISED AT THE TIME OF THE SALE. I DID NOT PURCHASE MY MOTORCYCLE FROM THE PLACE IN GREENSBORO BUT THEY GAVE ME THE INFO ABOUT THEIR EXPERIENCE. THIS IS NOT A COMPLAIN AGAINST THEM? THE DEALER WHERE MINE WAS PURCHASED IS APARENTLY OUT OF BUSINESS.*AK

THIS IS A CONCERN OVER THE TRANSMISSION PROBLEMS ON THIS MOTORCYCLE.  IT HAS HAPPENED TO A SMALL NUMBER OF OWNERS AND THE REST OF US ARE BECOMING CONCERNED.  EXCELSIOR WILL NOT DEAL WITH THIS PROBLEM.  THE TRANSMISSION CAN SEIZE AND CAUSE SERIOUS INJURY OR DEATH, TO RIDER AND PASSENGER.  THIS MUST BE ADDRESSED FOR SAFETYS SAKE TO PROTECT LIVES. *AK

RV UNIT HAS LEAKED GASOLINE FOR A YEAR, DEALER AND MANUFACTOR HAS GIVE ME THE RUN AROUND FOR A YEAR NOW. THE UNIT HAS A SKIP AND WOULD SOME TIMES STALL. FINALLY GOT STUCK OUT OF TOWN IN UNIT AND HAD  GAS STATION MACHANIC LOOK AT IT. HE SAID SOME ONE DID NOT SECURE THE COMPUTOR HARNESS AND IT LAID ON THE MANIFOLD AND MELTED COMPLETELY INTO. BUT IT LOOKED LIKE SOME ONE HAD TOOK BLACK TAPE AND TRIED TO SPLICE THEM BACK TOGETHER. HE TRIED TO FIT THEM TOGETHER BETTER AND SAID THAT SHOULD GET US HOME. CAN NOT GET ANY ONE TO WARRANTY. WAS SUPPOSE TO BE BRAND NEW UNIT. *AK

THE REAR LIGHTS ON THIS LARGE 5TH WHEEL TRAILER ARE IN VIOLATION OF DOT REGUALTIONS AS TO THE PERPENDICULARITY TO THE CENTER LINE AND PRESENT A DANGEROUS HAZARD TO BOTH THE DRIVER/PASSENGERS OF THE SUBJECT VEHICLE AND TO OTHER VEHICLES ON THE ROAD.   I INTEND TO MOVE MY TRAILER FROM TEXAS TO INDIANA IN MARCH OF 2001 AND I KNOW IT IT IS HAZARDOUS HAVING BEEN TOLD SO BY TRUCKERS ON THE HIGHWAY.  THE LIGHT ARE DIRECTED 30 DEGREES FROM THE DESIRED 90 DEGREES OFF CENTERLINE.*AK

EXTRA BRIGHT, BLUE TINT, HEADLAMPS ON SEVERAL MAKES OF NEWER CARS ARE BLINDING TO ME AND MY WIFE.  I AM 67 YEARS OLD, AND ALL LIGHTS AT NIGHT HAVE HALOS AND RADIATING "SPARKLES" THAT REDUCE MY NIGHT VISION WHEN DRIVING.  THE NEW, EXTRA BRIGHT, BLUE LAMPS ARE MUCH WORSE - I EXTRAPOLATE TO WHAT NIGHT DRIVING WOULD BE LIKE IF THE MAJORITY OF CARS HAD SUCH LAMPS - I DON'T THINK I COULD THEN DRIVE SAFELY.  HOW CAN WE STOP THE PLORIFARATION OF THESE HAZARDS TO NAVIGATION (OR GET RID OF THEM)?  PS - SEALED BEAM HEADLAMPS WERE NOT SUCH A BAD IDEA.  HAVE  YOU NOTED THE REPLACEMENT COST OF MODERN-DAY HEADLAMP LENSES?*AK

THE GAS RANGE SUPPLY LINE (COPPER) IS DIRECTLY ROUTED UNDER THE KNIFE HOLDER-WHEN INSERTING THE KNIFE IT CAN CUT OR WEAKEN TNE GAS SUPPLY LINE- I HAVE REALIGNED THE PIPE- THIS IS FOR YOUR INFORMATION- ANY NEEDED INFO CALL ME LEE GITCHEL. *AK

NEW ULTRA-BRIGHT HEADLIGHTS BLIND ONCOMING DRIVERS AT NIGHT, ESPECIALLY HI-BEAMS; IS ANYONE COLLECTING STATISTICS ON HOW MANY ACCIDENTS THIS IS CAUSING, ESPECIALLY NOW THAT WE ARE IN THE SEASON WHERE EVENING RUSH HOUR IS IN THE DARK? IS THERE ANY LIMIT AS TO HOW BRIGHT HEADLIGHTS ARE ALLOWED TO BE?  *AK

THE INCIDENT OCCURRED WHEN I WAS QUICKLY APPROACHING A SHARP TURN AND WENT TO APPLY MY FRONT AND REAR BRAKES.  THE REAR BRAKE PEDAL ASSEMBLY WAS MISSING!  I WAS SCARED TO DEATH AND WAS BARELY ABLE TO RECOVER THE TURN. I WAS ABLE TO COME TO A COMPLETE STOP OUT OF THE TURN W/ THE FRONT BRAKE ALONE.  I INSPECTED THE REAR BRAKE PEDAL ASSEMBLY, AND THE BOLT WAS GONE THAT HOLDS IT TOGETHER AND ALLOWS THE PEDAL TO PIVOT BACK AND FORTH. THE PEDAL WAS HANGING ONLY FROM FROM A LINE AND SPRING.

WHILE TRAVELING ON THE HIGHWAY, THE ENGINE OF THE VEHICLE SHUT OFF.  WHILE TRYING TO STEER THE VEHICLE OVER TO THE EMERGENCY LANE, THE BRAKES AND THE STEERING WHEEL LOCKED UP CAUSING THE VEHICLE TO GO OFF THE SIDE OF THE ROAD AND INTO A DITCH.  THE CAR SPUN AND LANDED ON ALL FOUR WHEELS AND ONLY THE DRIVER WAS INJURED. DURING THE ACTUAL ACCIDENT THE AIRBAGS, NEVER DEPLOYED.  I FEEL THEY SHOULD HAVE DUE TO THE IMPACT OF HITTING THE DITCH HEAD FIRST. (TIRESIZE: 185/60R14)( DOT NUMBER:  TIRE SIZE: 185/60R14 )

components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING
summary: ON AUGUST 27, 2000 WE LOST A LOVED ONE SUDDENLY AND TRAGICALLY AS A RESULT OF A MOTORCYCLE ACCIDENT. CURRENTLY WE HAVE SECURED THE MOTORCYCLE AND IN SO DOING DISCOVERED A CRACK IN THE LOWER MOTOR AREA. THE MASSACHUSETTES STATE POLOICE INDICATED THAT THEY SUSPECT THAT THE REAR WHEEL LOCKED UP ACCORDING TO EYE WITNESSESS ACCOUNTS. WE FEEL THAT THE MOTOR CRACKED FIRST AND THAN CAUSED THE REAR WHEEL TO LOCK UP, SUBSEQUENTLY KILLING OUR LOVED ONE. THE FOLLOWING IS A DESCRIPTION OF THE AFTER MARKET WARRANTEED MOTOR: ENGINE SIZE: 100 INCH V-TWIN, MFG: REVTECH OF SOUTH KOREA, DISTRIBUTOR: CUSTOM CHROME OF SAN JOSE CA....IF YOU HAVE ANY ONTHER COMPLAINTS / FATALITIES OR RECALL NOTICES REGARDING THIS MOTOR COULD YOU CONTACT US AS SOON AS POSSIBLE. IF THIS REQUEST  IS NOT A FORMAL COMPLAINT FEEL FREE TO REMIT A COMPLAINT FORM TO ME AT MY MAILING ADDRESS. THANK YOU! JOHN P. VADNAIS @PRODIGY.NET

MANUFACTURE DATE - 3/31/00. THE 5-POINT HARNESS STRAPS PROVIDED WITH THE CARSEAT ARE VERY THIN AND FLIMSY. I HAVE OFTEN FOUND THEM DIFFICULT TO BUCKLE AND TWIST EASILY (ESPECIALLY UNDER THE SOFT STRAP COVERS). I HAVE CONTACTED COSCO AND THEY SENT NEW STRAPS THAT WERE IDENTICAL TO THE ORIGINAL ONES. I FEEL THAT BECAUSE THE STRAPS CAN TWIST SO EASILY, THEY ARE NOT AS EFFECTIVE IN AN ACCIDENT.
PLASTIC BEARING CAPS FATIGUE AND FRACTURE ALLOWING COMPLETE LOSS OF OIL LUBRICANT FROM BEARINGS CREATING RISK OF CATASTROPHIC BEARING FAILURE AND WHEEL SEPARATION.

THE REAR LIGHTS, AS INSTALLED BY THE MANUFACTURER, DO NOT POINT TO THE REAR OF THE VEHICLE.  THE MANUFACTURER IS NUWA  INDUSTRIES  I OBSERVED THAT THE LIGHTS WERE NEARLY INVISIBLE, AS VIEWED FROM THE REAR, WHILE STOPPED ON A MAJOR HIGHWAY AND WITH THE "FLASHER" LIGHTS ON.  THE PROBLEM IS THAT THE LIGHTS ARE DIRECTED OFF AT APPROXIMATELY A 30 DEGREE ANGLE FROM A LINE DIRECTLY DOWN THE HIGHWAY.  WHEN I WALKED UP CLOSE TO THE VEHICLE THE LIGHTS BECAME BRIGHT ENOUGH TO SEE ONLY WHEN I WALKED TO THE SIDE OF A LINE DIRECTLY AT THE REAR OF THE VEHICLE.  I NOTE THAT THE LAMP ASSEMBLIES HAVE VERY LITTLE REFLECTIVE AREA BEHIND THE LAMP BUT THE MAJOR PROBLEM IS THE LENS BEING FOCUSED OFF TO THE SIDE.  I BELIEVE MY FAMILY AND I AM UNSAFE WHEN APPLYING THE BRAKES, WHEN SIGNALLING A TURN AND WHEN AT A STOP OFF OR ON THE HIGHWAY.  THE MANUFACTURER IS NUWA INDUSTRIES, INC.  3701 JOHNSON RD.  CHANUTE KS 66720.  TEL. (316)431-2088.  *AK

ON NEW TRAILER, NEVER USED. SAFETY CHAINS WERE COMPRESSED BY MANUFACTURER TO INSTALL OVER A BOLT. THE MANUFACTURER COMPRESSED THE ELONGATION OUT OF THE CHAIN LINK TO MAKE IT WIDER TO FIT OVER THE BOLT.  THIS COMPRESSION CREATED SEVERE CRACKS WHICH ELIMINATED ANY STRUCTURAL STRENGTH OF THE CHAIN. IF THE TRAILER DISCONNECTED FROM THE TOW VEHICLE, THESE CHAINS WILL NOT HOLD.  THERE IS THE POSSIBILITY THAT THESE CHAINS ARE NOT RATED WITH ENOUGH CAPACITY TO RETAIN THE TRAILER TO THE VEHICLE, EVEN IF THEY DID NOT HAVE THE CRACKS.

VIOLATION OF CALIFORNIA MOTOR VEHICLE CODE. DIVISION 15 SIZE, WEIGHT, AND LOAD, CHAPTER 2. WIDTH SEC. 35100(A)--------(A) THE TOTAL OUTSIDE WIDTH OF ANY VEHICLE OR ITS LOAD AHALL NOT EXCEED 102 INCHES, EXCEPT AS OTHERWISE PROVIDED IN THIS CHAPTER.-------THE TRAILER AXEL/WHEEL WIDTH IS 105 INCHES-----THIS EXCEDES THE LEGAL LIMIT BY 3 INCHE -----I WAS TOLD BY THE CALIFORNIA HIGHWAY PATROL THAT I WOULD BE CITED FOR THIS VIOLATION AND WOULD BE HELD LIABLE IF THE TRAILER WAS EVER IN AN ACCIDENT,  I NOTIFIED THE DEALERSHIP WHO NOTIFIED THE MANUFACTURE .   THE MANUFACTURER TOLD ME TO PUT OFFSET TIRES AND WHEELS ON THE TRAILER.  I RESPONDED IT WAS NOT MY RESPONSIBILITY TO DO SO.  THEY REPLIED THEY WOULD BUILD NEW AXELS AND HAVE THEM INSTALLED.  THAT WAS THREE MONTHS AGO...IT IS OBVIOUS THE MANUFACTURER HAS NO INTENTION OF REPAIRING THE TRAILER.  THEREFORE I CAN NOT USE THE TRAILER FOR FEAR OF BEING CITED BY THE CHP  OR THE LIABILITY ASPECT.  I WAS TOLD BY THE CHP TO CONTACT YOU .  *AK

THE BIKES FRAME SITS TOO LOW CAUSING THE BIKE TO DRAG WHEN MAKING CORNERS.  WE FEEL THIS IS A SAFEY ISSUE BECAUSE IF THE BIKE SHOULD CATCH SOMETHING ON THE GROUND IT COULD CAUSE AN ACCIDENT.  WE ALREADY ALMOST HIT A TRACTOR TRAILER WHILE TRYING TO NEGOTIATE A RIGHT HAND TURN FROM A STOP SIGN.  *AK

THIS IS THE SECOND EBHBB.  I CALLED COSCO AND THEY SENT THIS REPLACEMENT.  WITH BOTH OF THESE SEATS, THE SCREWS THAT HOLD IN THE A-CLAMP COME LOOSE CAUSING THE WHOLE CLAMP TO MOVE.  I CALLED THEM AGAIN TODAY AND THEY ARE REPLACING THE SEAT ONCE MORE.  THIS CLAMP IS WHAT TIGHTENS AND LOOSENS THE HARNESS. *AK

WE WERE TRAVELING TO OKLAHOMA TO RACE WHEN THE WELDS BROKE THAT HOLDS THE TRAILER FRAME TO THE TRAILER HITCH THAT ATTACHES TO THE TRUCK.  WHEN WE WERE WARNED BY OTHER TRAFFIC WE ONLY HAD TIME ENOUGH TO PULL OVER TO A PARKING LOT OFF THE HIGHWAY BEFORE THE TRAILER HAD DROPPED TO TWO OR THREE INCHES OFF THE GROUND.  THE WELDER THAT FIXED THE TRAILER SAID THE WELDS THAT ORIGINALLY WERE ON THIS TRAILER ARE INFERIOR.  WE WOULD HAVE GOTTEN KILLED OR KILLED OTHER TRAFFICE IF THAT TRAILER HAD COMPLETELY BROKE OFF THE HITCH AS IT WOULD HAVE IF WE HAD BEEN WARNED ANY LATER.  THE MANUFACTURER REFUSES TO RETURN MESSAGES AND AS OF TODAY, THEIR PHONES HAVE BEEN DISCONNECTED.

PULL VEHICLE INTO GARAGE, STOPPED. WITH FOOT ON BRAKE, REACHED TO PUT CAR IN "PARK". SUDDEN ACCELERATION; ENOUGH TO BURN PAINT OFF GARAGE FLOOR. THE SCENARIO OF FOOT SLIPPING OFF BRAKE PEDAL IS INADEQUATE TO ACCOUNT FOR DAMAGE LEVEL AND "BURN-OUT" OF TIRES.PHOTOS TAKEN.
